translations: adv.应受责难地；应受斥责地

phrs.translation: 应受斥责地, 应指责地

sentences.sentence: In a classic love story, there are two kinds of man. One is the man who has little difficulty in asking women out. He is generally portrayed as being reprehensibly confident in this way.
sentences.translation: 在经典的爱情故事中，有两种男人：一种男人是经常约会女性，他们通常被认为过于自大。
